snippet: The Salon de Fleurus on Spring Street, a re-creation of Gertrude Stein's place at 27 Rue de Fleurus in Paris, has stayed off much of the art world's radar. But some who got a peek will shed some of the mystery at MoMA on Thursday.
abstract: The Salon de Fleurus on Spring Street, a re-creation of Gertrude Stein's place at 27 Rue de Fleurus in Paris, has stayed off much of the art world's radar. But some who got a peek will shed some of the mystery at MoMA on Thursday.

headline.main: In SoHo, Salon Is a Salon, in Homage to Gertrude Stein
headline.print_headline: In SoHo, Salon Is a Salon, In Homage to Gertrude Stein
